mapper.sql: id, plate_no, vin, default_carry_num, ownership_type, position_sensor_flag, tachograph_flag, driving_license, driving_license_left_img, driving_license_right_img, driving_license_expire, create_user_id, create_time
mapper.select: select v.id as id, v.plate_no as plateNo,v.default_carry_num as defaultCarryNum,d.real_name as realName, d.phone as phone, (case d.mode when 0 then '代驾' when 1 then '干线司机' when 2 then '拖车司机' when 4 then '全支持' end) as mode, (case v.ownership_type when 0 then '韵车自营' when 1 then '个人所有' when 2 then '第三方物流公司' end) as ownershipType from d_driver d join d_driver_vehicle_con dvc on dvc.driver_id = d.id left join d_vehicle v on dvc.vehicle_id = v.id where v.id = #{vehicleId}

SELECT veh.id AS id, veh.plate_no AS plateNo, veh.default_carry_num AS defaultCarryNum, dri.real_name AS realName, dri.phone AS phone, dri.MODE AS MODE FROM d_vehicle veh JOIN d_driver_vehicle_con con ON con.vehicle_id = veh.id JOIN d_driver dri ON dri.id = con.driver_id JOIN d_carrier_driver_con cdc on cdc.driver_id = dri.id JOIN d_carrier carr ON carr.id = cdc.carrier_id WHERE carr.id = #{id}
